settings.title: Gear Up for Victory with Our FPS Gaming Selection
settings.description_col_1: Upgrade your loadout and dominate the battlefield with our handpicked selection of top-tier gaming peripherals. HyperX gear comes in clutch, whether you’re looking for a compact keyboard, gaming headset, or lightning-fast wireless mouse.

settings.desc: Unleash your full potential with the Alloy Rise 75 keyboard. Its 75% form factor strikes the perfect balance between compactness and functionality, allowing for greater mouse area so you can flick freely and hit your shots with pinpoint accuracy. Coupled with an ultra-responsive 8k polling rate for rapid keypress detection and lightning-fast response times, the Alloy Rise 75 has everything you need to stay locked in.

Comfort and game sense reigns supreme. Immerse yourself in the game with the Cloud III Wireless headset, and experience greater awareness and clearer comms with crisp sound, activated by DTS, which puts you right in the heart of the action. Say goodbye to distractions from wires and hello to uninterrupted gameplay with up to 120-hours of battery life.

Take your aim to the next level with the Pulsefire Haste 2 Wireless mouse. With an impressive 100 hours of battery life and an ultra-lightweight 61g design, this mouse is engineered to maximise movement and agility. Whether you’re flicking, predicting, or tracking – get unmatched precision and dominate your opponents.

Experience improved precision and dominance in every match with our FPS Gaming Peripheral Bundle. Featuring a high-DPI mouse for pinpoint accuracy, a form-factor mechanical keyboard with rapid response switches, and a surround sound headset to catch every crucial audio cue, this bundle is designed to elevate your performance.

settings.title: Explore Additional Loadout Options:
settings.subtitle: Dominate the meta with our expanded FPS gaming selection.
